00020 /**
00021  * @defgroup ApnsPHP_Push_Server Server
00022  * @ingroup ApnsPHP_Push
00023  */
00024 
00025 /**
00026  * The Push Notification Server Provider.
00027  *
00028  * The class manages multiple Push Notification Providers and an inter-process message
00029  * queue. This class is useful to parallelize and speed-up send activities to Apple
00030  * Push Notification service.
00031  *
00032  * @ingroup ApnsPHP_Push_Server
00033  */
00034 class ApnsPHP_Push_Server extends ApnsPHP_Push
00035 {
00036     const MAIN_LOOP_USLEEP = 200000; /**< @type integer Main loop sleep time in micro seconds. */
00037     const SHM_SIZE = 524288; /**< @type integer Shared memory size in bytes useful to store message queues. */
00038     const SHM_MESSAGES_QUEUE_KEY_START = 1000; /**< @type integer Message queue start identifier for messages. For every process 1 is added to this number. */
00039     const SHM_ERROR_MESSAGES_QUEUE_KEY = 999; /**< @type integer Message queue identifier for not delivered messages. */
00040 
00041     protected $_nProcesses = 3; /**< @type integer The number of processes to start. */
00042     protected $_aPids = array(); /**< @type array Array of process PIDs. */
00043     protected $_nParentPid; /**< @type integer The parent process id. */
00044     protected $_nCurrentProcess; /**< @type integer Cardinal process number (0, 1, 2, ...). */
00045     protected $_nRunningProcesses; /**< @type integer The number of running processes. */
00046 
00047     protected $_hShm; /**< @type resource Shared memory. */
00048     protected $_hSem; /**< @type resource Semaphore. */
00049 
00050     /**
00051      * Constructor.
00052      *
00053      * @param  $nEnvironment @type integer Environment.
00054      * @param  $sProviderCertificateFile @type string Provider certificate file
00055      *         with key (Bundled PEM).
00056      * @throws ApnsPHP_Push_Server_Exception if is unable to
00057      *         get Shared Memory Segment or Semaphore ID.
00058      */
00059     public function __construct($nEnvironment, $sProviderCertificateFile)
00060     {
00061         parent::__construct($nEnvironment, $sProviderCertificateFile);
00062 
00063         $this->_nParentPid = posix_getpid();
00064         $this->_hShm = shm_attach(mt_rand(), self::SHM_SIZE);
00065         if ($this->_hShm === false) {
00066             throw new ApnsPHP_Push_Server_Exception(
00067                 'Unable to get shared memory segment'
00068             );
00069         }
00070 
00071         $this->_hSem = sem_get(mt_rand());
00072         if ($this->_hSem === false) {
00073             throw new ApnsPHP_Push_Server_Exception(
00074                 'Unable to get semaphore id'
00075             );
00076         }
00077 
00078         register_shutdown_function(array($this, 'onShutdown'));
00079 
00080         pcntl_signal(SIGCHLD, array($this, 'onChildExited'));
00081         foreach(array(SIGTERM, SIGQUIT, SIGINT) as $nSignal) {
00082             pcntl_signal($nSignal, array($this, 'onSignal'));
00083         }
00084     }
00085 
00086     /**
00087      * Checks if the server is running and calls signal handlers for pending signals.
00088      *
00089      * Example:
00090      * @code
00091      * while ($Server->run()) {
00092      *     // do somethings...
00093      *     usleep(200000);
00094      * }
00095      * @endcode
00096      *
00097      * @return @type boolean True if the server is running.
00098      */
00099     public function run()
00100     {
00101         pcntl_signal_dispatch();
00102         return $this->_nRunningProcesses > 0;
00103     }
00104 
00105     /**
00106      * Waits until a forked process has exited and decreases the current running
00107      * process number.
00108      */
00109     public function onChildExited()
00110     {
00111         while (pcntl_waitpid(-1, $nStatus, WNOHANG) > 0) {
00112             $this->_nRunningProcesses--;
00113         }
00114     }
00115 
00116     /**
00117      * When a child (not the parent) receive a signal of type TERM, QUIT or INT
00118      * exits from the current process and decreases the current running process number.
00119      *
00120      * @param  $nSignal @type integer Signal number.
00121      */
00122     public function onSignal($nSignal)
00123     {
00124         switch ($nSignal) {
00125             case SIGTERM:
00126             case SIGQUIT:
00127             case SIGINT:
00128                 if (($nPid = posix_getpid()) != $this->_nParentPid) {
00129                     $this->_log("INFO: Child $nPid received signal #{$nSignal}, shutdown...");
00130                     $this->_nRunningProcesses--;
00131                     exit(0);
00132                 }
00133                 break;
00134             default:
00135                 $this->_log("INFO: Ignored signal #{$nSignal}.");
00136                 break;
00137         }
00138     }
00139 
00140     /**
00141      * When the parent process exits, cleans shared memory and semaphore.
00142      *
00143      * This is called using 'register_shutdown_function' pattern.
00144      * @see http://php.net/register_shutdown_function
00145      */
00146     public function onShutdown()
00147     {
00148         if (posix_getpid() == $this->_nParentPid) {
00149             $this->_log('INFO: Parent shutdown, cleaning memory...');
00150             @shm_remove($this->_hShm) && @shm_detach($this->_hShm);
00151             @sem_remove($this->_hSem);
00152         }
00153     }
00154 
00155     /**
00156      * Set the total processes to start, default is 3.
00157      *
00158      * @param  $nProcesses @type integer Processes to start up.
00159      */
00160     public function setProcesses($nProcesses)
00161     {
00162         $nProcesses = (int)$nProcesses;
00163         if ($nProcesses <= 0) {
00164             return;
00165         }
00166         $this->_nProcesses = $nProcesses;
00167     }
00168 
00169     /**
00170      * Starts the server forking all processes and return immediately.
00171      *
00172      * Every forked process is connected to Apple Push Notification Service on start
00173      * and enter on the main loop.
00174      */
00175     public function start()
00176     {
00177         for ($i = 0; $i < $this->_nProcesses; $i++) {
00178             $this->_nCurrentProcess = $i;
00179             $this->_aPids[$i] = $nPid = pcntl_fork();
00180             if ($nPid == -1) {
00181                 $this->_log('WARNING: Could not fork');
00182             } else if ($nPid > 0) {
00183                 // Parent process
00184                 $this->_log("INFO: Forked process PID {$nPid}");
00185                 $this->_nRunningProcesses++;
00186             } else {
00187                 // Child process
00188                 try {
00189                     parent::connect();
00190                 } catch (ApnsPHP_Exception $e) {
00191                     $this->_log('ERROR: ' . $e->getMessage() . ', exiting...');
00192                     exit(1);
00193                 }
00194                 $this->_mainLoop();
00195                 parent::disconnect();
00196                 exit(0);
00197             }
00198         }
00199     }
00200 
00201     /**
00202      * Adds a message to the inter-process message queue.
00203      *
00204      * Messages are added to the queues in a round-robin fashion starting from the
00205      * first process to the last.
00206      *
00207      * @param  $message @type ApnsPHP_Message The message.
00208      */
00209     public function add(ApnsPHP_Message $message)
00210     {
00211         static $n = 0;
00212         if ($n >= $this->_nProcesses) {
00213             $n = 0;
00214         }
00215         sem_acquire($this->_hSem);
00216         $aQueue = $this->_getQueue(self::SHM_MESSAGES_QUEUE_KEY_START, $n);
00217         $aQueue[] = $message;
00218         $this->_setQueue(self::SHM_MESSAGES_QUEUE_KEY_START, $n, $aQueue);
00219         sem_release($this->_hSem);
00220         $n++;
00221     }
00222 
00223     /**
00224      * Returns messages in the message queue.
00225      *
00226      * When a message is successful sent or reached the maximum retry time is removed
00227      * from the message queue and inserted in the Errors container. Use the getErrors()
00228      * method to retrive messages with delivery error(s).
00229      *
00230      * @param  $bEmpty @type boolean @optional Empty message queue.
00231      * @return @type array Array of messages left on the queue.
00232      */
00233     public function getQueue($bEmpty = true)
00234     {
00235         $aRet = array();
00236         sem_acquire($this->_hSem);
00237         for ($i = 0; $i < $this->_nProcesses; $i++) {
00238             $aRet = array_merge($aRet, $this->_getQueue(self::SHM_MESSAGES_QUEUE_KEY_START, $i));
00239             if ($bEmpty) {
00240                 $this->_setQueue(self::SHM_MESSAGES_QUEUE_KEY_START, $i);
00241             }
00242         }
00243         sem_release($this->_hSem);
00244         return $aRet;
00245     }
00246 
00247     /**
00248      * Returns messages not delivered to the end user because one (or more) error
00249      * occurred.
00250      *
00251      * @param  $bEmpty @type boolean @optional Empty message container.
00252      * @return @type array Array of messages not delivered because one or more errors
00253      *         occurred.
00254      */
00255     public function getErrors($bEmpty = true)
00256     {
00257         sem_acquire($this->_hSem);
00258         $aRet = $this->_getQueue(self::SHM_ERROR_MESSAGES_QUEUE_KEY);
00259         if ($bEmpty) {
00260             $this->_setQueue(self::SHM_ERROR_MESSAGES_QUEUE_KEY, 0, array());
00261         }
00262         sem_release($this->_hSem);
00263         return $aRet;
00264     }
00265 
00266     /**
00267      * The process main loop.
00268      *
00269      * During the main loop: the per-process error queue is read and the common error message
00270      * container is populated; the per-process message queue is spooled (message from
00271      * this queue is added to ApnsPHP_Push queue and delivered).
00272      */
00273     protected function _mainLoop()
00274     {
00275         while (true) {
00276             pcntl_signal_dispatch();
00277 
00278             if (posix_getppid() != $this->_nParentPid) {
00279                 $this->_log("INFO: Parent process {$this->_nParentPid} died unexpectedly, exiting...");
00280                 break;
00281             }
00282 
00283             sem_acquire($this->_hSem);
00284             $this->_setQueue(self::SHM_ERROR_MESSAGES_QUEUE_KEY, 0,
00285                 array_merge($this->_getQueue(self::SHM_ERROR_MESSAGES_QUEUE_KEY), parent::getErrors())
00286             );
00287 
00288             $aQueue = $this->_getQueue(self::SHM_MESSAGES_QUEUE_KEY_START, $this->_nCurrentProcess);
00289             foreach($aQueue as $message) {
00290                 parent::add($message);
00291             }
00292             $this->_setQueue(self::SHM_MESSAGES_QUEUE_KEY_START, $this->_nCurrentProcess);
00293             sem_release($this->_hSem);
00294 
00295             $nMessages = count($aQueue);
00296             if ($nMessages > 0) {
00297                 $this->_log('INFO: Process ' . ($this->_nCurrentProcess + 1) . " has {$nMessages} messages, sending...");
00298                 parent::send();
00299             } else {
00300                 usleep(self::MAIN_LOOP_USLEEP);
00301             }
00302         }
00303     }
00304 
00305     /**
00306      * Returns the queue from the shared memory.
00307      *
00308      * @param  $nQueueKey @type integer The key of the queue stored in the shared
00309      *         memory.
00310      * @param  $nProcess @type integer @optional The process cardinal number.
00311      * @return @type array Array of messages from the queue.
00312      */
00313     protected function _getQueue($nQueueKey, $nProcess = 0)
00314     {
00315         if (!shm_has_var($this->_hShm, $nQueueKey + $nProcess)) {
00316             return array();
00317         }
00318         return shm_get_var($this->_hShm, $nQueueKey + $nProcess);
00319     }
00320 
00321     /**
00322      * Store the queue into the shared memory.
00323      *
00324      * @param  $nQueueKey @type integer The key of the queue to store in the shared
00325      *         memory.
00326      * @param  $nProcess @type integer @optional The process cardinal number.
00327      * @param  $aQueue @type array @optional The queue to store into shared memory.
00328      *         The default value is an empty array, useful to empty the queue.
00329      * @return @type boolean True on success, false otherwise.
00330      */
00331     protected function _setQueue($nQueueKey, $nProcess = 0, $aQueue = array())
00332     {
00333         if (!is_array($aQueue)) {
00334             $aQueue = array();
00335         }
00336         return shm_put_var($this->_hShm, $nQueueKey + $nProcess, $aQueue);
00337     }
00338 }
